entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow near the Ogilvie mountains. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 March 2023
